import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { CommonModule } from '@angular/common'; @Component({ selector: 'app-footer', standalone: true, imports: [CommonModule], templateUrl: './footer.component.html', styleUrls: ['./footer.component.scss'] }) export class FooterComponent { currentYear = new Date().getFullYear(); }
